content.raw:
otherwise the plugin is working fine ! I use it from some time already and got no problem until gazebo9 were it seems that something change as pitch axis on copter isn't stable anymore... 
I also work on adding more data like battery, airspeed, rangefinder, and gps handling with succes. The use of gps is tricky as we can't change gps frame... (I don't push that on ardupilot side yet)
content.html: otherwise the plugin is working fine ! I use it from some time already and got no problem until gazebo9 were it seems that something change as pitch axis on copter isn't stable anymore... I also work on adding more data like battery, airspeed, rangefinder, and gps handling with succes. The use of gps is tricky as we can't change gps frame... (I don't push that on ardupilot side yet)
